Player History
Drafted in 44th round, 702nd overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Injured on 4/22/2015 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/5/2015, off Branden Chow (SLB)...

Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 6/6/2016.
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2017 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/18/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $945,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Montreal on 5/22/2018.
